nodes.text: Fedalle was a wealthy and industrious world of the Core. The New Republic Senator Hrekin Thorm was a native of Fedalle.
Fedalle joined the Galactic Republic early in its history, sometime between 25,000 BBY and 22,000 BBY.
The planet didn't secede during the Clone Wars.
It would later align with the Galactic Empire at its formation in 19 BBY. Hrekin Thorm represented Fedalle in both the Imperial Senate and the New Republic Senate.
